TXT_KEY_ANR_CONTENT:
An application {title} - {class} is not responding.
What do you want to do with it?
TXT_KEY_PERMISSION_REQUEST_UNKNOWN: An application {app} is requesting an unknown permission.
TXT_KEY_PERMISSION_REQUEST_SCREENCOPY: An application {app} is trying to capture your screen. Do you want to allow it to?
TXT_KEY_PERMISSION_REQUEST_PLUGIN: An application {app} is trying to load a plugin: {plugin}. Do you want to allow it to?
TXT_KEY_PERMISSION_REQUEST_KEYBOARD: A new keyboard has been detected: {keyboard}. Do you want to allow it to operate?
TXT_KEY_PERMISSION_PERSISTENCE_HINT: Hint: you can set persistent rules for these in the Hyprland config file.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_EXTERNAL_XDG_DESKTOP:
Your XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP environment seems to be managed externally, and the current value is {value}.
This might cause issues unless it's intentional.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_NO_GUIUTILS: Your system does not have hyprland-guiutils installed. This is a runtime dependency for some dialogs. Consider installing it.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_INVALID_MONITOR_LAYOUT: Your monitor layout is set up incorrectly. Monitor {name} overlaps with other monitor(s) in the layout. Please see the wiki (Monitors page) for more. This will cause issues.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_MONITOR_MODE_FAIL: Monitor {name} failed to set any requested modes, falling back to mode {mode}.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_MONITOR_AUTO_SCALE: Invalid scale passed to monitor {name}: {scale}, using suggested scale: {fixed_scale}
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_CM_RELOAD_FAILED: CM shader reload failed, falling back to rgba/rgbx.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_WIDE_COLOR_NOT_10B: Monitor {name}: wide color gamut is enabled but the display is not in 10-bit mode.
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_NO_WATCHDOG: Hyprland was started without start-hyprland. This is highly not recommended unless you are in a debugging environment.
TXT_KEY_SAFE_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
Hyprland has been launched in safe mode, which means your last session crashed.
Safe mode prevents your config from being loaded. You can troubleshoot in this environment, or load your config with the button below.
Default keybinds apply: SUPER+Q for kitty, SUPER+R for a basic runner, SUPER+M to exit.
Restarting Hyprland will launch in normal mode again.

TXT_KEY_NOTIF_FAILED_ASSETS.count <= 1: Hyprland failed to load {count} essential asset, blame your distro's packager for doing a bad job at packaging!
TXT_KEY_NOTIF_FAILED_ASSETS.*: Hyprland failed to load {count} essential assets, blame your distro's packager for doing a bad job at packaging!
